name: List reactions for a team discussion comment

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://developer.github.com/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a team discussion comment.

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

description: List the reactions to a [team discussion comment](https://developer.github.com/v3/teams/discussion_comments/). OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](https://developer.github.com/apps/building-oauth-apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps/).
